title: An Act providing transparency in third party litigation financing

abstracts.abstract: By Representative Madaro of Boston, a petition (accompanied by bill, House, No. 1861) of Adrian C. Madaro relative to third party litigation financing.  The Judiciary.

actions.description: Referred to the committee on The Judiciary
